title: Agile Senior Tester
description:
Agile Senior Tester This project is about video communication that ensures stability and user-friendliness to a high standard.
Continuous development and testing of the software is necessary.

The following tasks are required:
- Design, specification, implementation and documentation of software tests, taking into account the 
processes, methods and tools in the IT system house
- Creation and implementation of automated tests
- Planning and controlling the execution of system integration tests, test...
skills: Experience with public authorities an advantage
